scripts.buildcity: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/city_01.glb --output components/CityModelGenerated.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/CityModelGenerated.tsx
scripts.buildtaxi: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/taxi.glb --output components/TaxiModelGenerated.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/TaxiModelGenerated.tsx
scripts.buildmodels: npm run buildcity && npm run buildtaxi
scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p ~/_git/intervolzdotcom/public/crazytaxi && cp -r out/* ~/_git/intervolzdotcom/public/crazytaxi/ && echo 'Deployed to intervolz.com/crazytaxi'
